text: I My zaveshchali cheloveku byt' dobrym k svoim roditelyam i zabotit'sya o nikh, osobenno o materi, ibo mat' nosit yego v svoyey utrobe, i yeyo slabost' uvelichivayetsya po mere togo, kak rastot rebonok; i ona otluchayet yego ot grudi tol'ko cherez dva goda. My poveleli: "Blagodari Menya i svoikh roditeley: ko Mne vse vernutsya dlya raschota i vozdayaniya
